xmlText.p: MILWAUKEE BREWERS — Named Daniel Fumai chief financial officer.
NEW YORK METS — Agreed to terms with OF Matt den Dekker to a minor league contract.
LONG ISLAND DUCKS — Signed LHP Jake Fisher.
NEW JERSEY JACKALS — Traded RHP Kyle Hansen to Kansas City (AA) for OF Marcus Lemon.
SUSSEX COUNTY MINERS — Released INF Nick Giarraputo and RHP Hector Nelo.

NEW YROK GIANTS — Named Mike Shula offensive coordinator and quarterbacks coach, Tyke Tolbert wide receivers coach, Hal Hunter offensive line coach, Ben Wilkerson assistant offensive line coach, James Bettcher defensive coordinator, Gary Emanuel defensive line coach, Lou Anarumo defensive backs coach, Deshea Townsend assistant defensive backs coach, Thomas McGaughey special teams coordiantor and Anthony Blevins assistant special teams coach. Retained Craig Johnson running backs coach, Lunda Wells tight ends coach, Ryan Roeder offensive assistant coach, Bill McGovern linebackers coach, Rob Leonard assistant linebackers coach and Bobby Blick defensive assistant coach.
EDMONTON ESKIMOS — Re-signed RB John White.
CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS — Recalled G Jean-Francois Berube from Rockford (AHL). Assigned G Jeff Glass to Rockford.
SPORTING KANSAS CITY — Signed G Eric Dick and D Graham Smith to one-year contracts.
SKY BLUE FC — Acquired MF Carli Lloyd, Fs Janine Beckie, Adriana Leon and G Kailen Sheridan through allocation.
JACKSONVILLE ARMADA FC — Announced the retirement of D Aaron Pitchkolan and named him assistant coach.
ALBANY (NY)_Named Kevin Cardoza assistant volleyball coach.
CHARLESTON SOUTHERN — Named Chad Scott assistant athletic director of student-athlete development and Connor Klekota men's assistant soccer coach.
CITADEL — Named Dave Zelenock women's volleyball coach.
COASTAL CAROLINA — Named T.J. Hollowell assistant football coach.
FURMAN — Named Andre' Bernandi director of strength training and conditioning.
SIENA — Named Vilis Ozols volleyball coach.
SOUTH CAROLINA — Named George Wynn director of football operations and Ethan Pheister women's assistant volleyball coach.
TEXAS — Fired track coach Mario Sategna.
